body:
## When not to use this form

You can't use this form to complain about:

* [the outcome of a case](https://www.judiciary.uk/you-and-the-judiciary/appeals-process/)
* [a judge, tribunal member or magistrate](https://judicialconduct.judiciary.gov.uk/)

### Before you start

If you have documents to support your complaint, you'll need to take photos of these or scan the originals.

extraComponents.html: Find out [how HM Courts and Tribunals Service uses personal information](https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/personal-information-charter).

heading: Complain to HMCTS about a court or tribunal
lede: Use this form to make a complaint to HMCTS about a court or tribunal.
